Articles.Content:
Jeb wasn\'t kidding.

He has gone and turned his asymmetrical Launch Tower Lift into an orbit capable spacecraft.

No-one here at KSP is quite sure how it works, as no-one has been brave enough to touch the darn thing. The engineers are afraid it will fall apart if you look at it too hard.

See for yourself:

It\'s not pretty. It\'s not symmetrical. It\'s not exactly stable most of the time. It\'s certainly not safe. But it will get you to orbit.

The following slideshow may provide some assistance in how to fly this, unique, remarkable, outrageous craft.

http://imgur.com/a/kkAlJ

Be warned, this craft is challenging, and RCS must be used carefully, sparingly and with a deft touch. It might be worth using duct tape to restrain Jeb.
ok, now land on the towe from Orbit
